history.proof: intros a b p q H1 H2. unfold pX. qauto use: pluspf_is_plusP, plusP_inv3b unfold: pX.

ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.

ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.

ctx: intros a b p q H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H1 : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b H2 : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) Unable to unify "pluspf (a :: p) (b :: q)" with "plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b :: pluspf p q".

original: intros a b p q H1 H2. unfold pX. rewrite H1. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
